full_summary:
Volunteer Coordinator Services for Metro Vancouver East Region (#21880-24-0001)

**Request for Proposal (RFP)** 

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Pacific Region, invites suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of Volunteer Coordinator Services for the Metro Vancouver East region. The contract is valued at $X and will commence on April 1, 2024, with an estimated duration of 12 months.

**Key Objectives:**
- Provide volunteer coordination services, including recruitment, orientation, training, and management of volunteer activities.
- Successfully engage volunteers to meet offender needs.

**Scope of Work:**
- Conduct volunteer recruitment and screening, ensuring reliability status clearance before accepting applicants.
- Provide quarterly status reports of volunteer hours and activities.
- Develop and implement volunteer programs to meet correctional needs.

**Bid Submission Requirements:**
- Interested suppliers must submit a proposal outlining their approach to the work, including methodologies, timelines, and budget.
- Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document, available on the Canada Buys / Tender Opportunities website.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
- Lowest price compliant bid.

**Procurement Process:**
- This tender is open to all interested suppliers.
- There are no special qualifications or experience requirements for this project.

**Deliverables:**
- The successful bidder must provide the following deliverables:
	1. A quarterly status report of volunteer hours and activities.
	2. A detailed report of program participation.

**Timeline:**
- Bid submissions must be received by [insert date] at 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time.
- The contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and will run for 12 months, with an option to renew for four additional one-year periods.

**Queries and Discussion:**
- Bidders can address questions and concerns to Carmen Skolos, Contracting Authority, by email at [carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca) or by phone at (236) 380-0057.

**Contact Information:**
- Carmen Skolos, Contracting Authority: [carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca), (236) 380-0057.

**Note to Bidders:**
- Suppliers can obtain the complete solicitation document and evaluation criteria by downloading them from the Canada Buys / Tender Opportunities website
